data.title: Nicole Cember on LinkedIn: Amazing session with Olivia and our Style Crew Influencers today! Thanks‚Ä¶
data.meta_description: Amazing session with Olivia and our Style Crew Influencers today! Thanks to Olivia for adding so much value to our program and to our creators! :)
data.text:
This week, Olivia Wei and I planned and hosted the first ever #MacysStyleCrew Influencer Dinner for 16 of our Style Crew Influencers celebrating the launch of the program this season. During dinner, Sara A Holmgren interviewed Maria Menounos, who gave inspiring advice on how to overcome obstacles in life and follow your passions and curiosity. Sara also interviewed Paige DeSorbo and Hannah Berner of the ‚ÄúGiggly Squad‚Äù podcast and Bravo‚Äôs ‚ÄúSummer House;‚Äù both gave great advice on how to think about the negativity that comes with being in the public eye and being your true self to your audience. Before leaving, the influencers got fun goodie bags with some items from several of our vendors! Thanks to our agency partners, event planner, and the rest of our internal teams for making this event and the program possible! You know who you are and we couldn‚Äôt do it without you! And of course, thanks to our amazing creators who we had the pleasure to meet and get to know - all kind and wonderful people that we‚Äôre lucky to have as Style Crew members! You can check out some of the fun from this amazing event through #MSCinNYC and #macysstylecrew Macy's

So excited to be starting the next chapter in my career as a Senior Influencer Marketing Manager on the Social Strategy team at Macy's! I‚Äôll be leading our long-term influencer and social commerce strategy supporting the continued growth of Style Crew, our one-of-a-kind influencer program. Thank you to Sara A Holmgren and anne dunn for this opportunity and their continued support, mentorship, and leadership during my time at Macy‚Äôs. And a special thank you to Alex James for his constant guidance, encouragement, and recognition that has allowed me to confidently take my next step. Looking forward to diving head first into all the amazing opportunities this role and community have to offer! Check out the Style Crew here: https://lnkd.in/d2V8S4u6

If you‚Äôre a Cornell alum working in Retail, please join the new LinkedIn group for the Cornell Fashion Industry network! üéâ This group will introduce you to other alumni working in the field through the page itself and also in future networking events! It‚Äôs also a place to help mentor current students in their path towards a career in retail! üíº Join me in being a part of the future of retail and connecting us closer together in this crazy time! üëäüèº Please contact me Jacklyn DeVito or Hansika Iyer if more info needed!
